sentences.en: ...a tube less than a fifth of the diameter of a human hair.
sentences.cn: …一根直径不到头发五分之一的微管。

sentences.en: A diameter passes through the center of a circle.
Draw a circle six centimetres in diameter.
sentences.cn: 画一个直径为六厘米的圆。

sentences.en: Geodetic theodolites generally have circles of about 140 mm diameter.
sentences.cn: 大地经纬仪的度盘直径一般为140毫米.

sentences.en: It is a stainless steel tube about 2 cm in diameter.
sentences.cn: 它是直径约2厘米的不锈钢管.

sentences.en: Large diameter wafers are feasible and 200 - mm wafers have been produced.
sentences.cn: 大直径片子已不难制造,200mm的片子也已产生了.

sentences.en: One metre of fabric is sufficient to cover the exterior of an 18-in-diameter hatbox.
sentences.cn: 一米布足以包裹住直径为18英寸的帽盒。

sentences.en: The axis of a circle is its diameter.
The circle has a diameter of 6 inches.
The diameter and the circumference of a circle correlate.
sentences.cn: 圆的直径与圆周有相互关系.

sentences.en: the diameter of a tree trunk
The diameter of Mars is slightly over half that of the earth.
sentences.cn: 火星的直径比地球的半径稍大些.

sentences.en: The diameter of the tree trunk is about 2 meters.
sentences.cn: 这树干的直径大约是2米。

sentences.en: The fibre diameter increases with increasing fluidity of the molten oxide.
sentences.cn: 熔融氧化物的流化度增大,纤维直径增大.

sentences.en: The machines, each of which is perhaps five feet in diameter, are not the largest devices in the room.
sentences.cn: 这些机器每台直径大约5英尺，它们并不是这间屋里最大的设备。

sentences.en: This hole was a scant .23 inches in diameter.
sentences.cn: 这个洞眼的直径只有0.23英寸。

sentences.en: This last error depends on the wire spacing and diameter.
sentences.cn: 后者引起的误差取决于导线的距离和直径.

words.tran_cn: 直径的；正好相反的；截然的
完全地；作为直径地；直接地；正好相反地

phrases.tran_cn: n. 平均直径；算术平均径
直径比；内外径比；直径螺距比
大直径，外径；螺纹大径，大径
平均直径；中径；二次平均直径
粒径；颗粒直径，粒子直径

trans.tran_en: a straight line from one side of a circle to the other side, passing through the centre of the circle, or the length of this line
